subject: Dear:Friend.
body:
Dear:Friend.
Congratulation,
You have been compensated with the sum of $2.5 Million United State
Dollars (Two Million Five Hundred United State Dollars) by United
Nation, from the Internet Fraud compensation programmed organized by
the ECOWAS co-sponsored by UN and IMF. Your email address and other 49
email addresses were selected from the Internet Fraud complainantâ€™s
blogs for this compensation.
Your Compensation Ref No: ECOWAS/IMF/FQ7XX.
The compensation fund is from the total sum of 500 Million euros,
realized so far from Internet fraudsters by the International Police
(Interpol) and the ECOWAS/UN  Commission.
For Claims Contact our office email address:  
robertlicano33@gmail.com
Do not forget to quote your Compensation Ref. No: ECOWAS/IMF/FQ7XX and
Your Full Name, so you can be directed on how to received your fund.
Congratulations,
For More Information Contact Mr Robert Licano on this NO: +1 479 662 9036
Public Relation Officer

subject: Re: Dear:Friend.
body:
Hello there,

Wow, that's quite a surprise! I can't believe my email was selected for this. Can you tell me more about how this program works? How were the funds collected from internet fraudsters? And what is the role of ECOWAS and UN in this?

Also, could you please explain what the Ref. No ECOWAS IMF is? I'm not sure I understand.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Carlos
